mapper.insert: insert into tbl_member (member_identification, member_pw, member_name, member_email, member_phone_number, member_address, member_address_detail, member_gender, member_birthday, member_grade, member_joined_date, member_status) values(#{memberIdentification}, #{memberPw}, #{memberName}, #{memberEmail}, #{memberPhoneNumber}, #{memberAddress}, #{memberAddressDetail}, #{memberGender}, #{memberBirthday}, #{memberGrade}, CURRENT_TIMESTAMP, '1')
mapper.select: select member_identification from tbl_member where member_identification = #{memberIdentification}
select member_email from tbl_member where member_email = #{memberEmail}

select member_id , member_identification , member_pw , member_name , member_email , member_phone_number , member_address , member_address_detail , member_gender , member_birthday , member_grade , member_joined_date , member_status from tbl_member where member_identification = #{memberIdentification} and member_pw = #{memberPw}
select member_identification, member_pw, member_name, member_email, member_phone_number, member_gender, member_birthday from tbl_member where member_id = #{memberId}
mapper.update: update tbl_member set member_identification=#{memberIdentification}, member_pw=#{memberPw}, member_name=#{memberName}, member_email=#{memberEmail}, member_phone_number=#{memberPhoneNumber}, member_gender=#{memberGender}, member_birthday=#{memberBirthday} where member_Id = #{memberId}
update tbl_member set member_status= 0 where member_id = #{memberId}
mapper.select: select member_id, member_name, member_joined_date, member_status from tbl_member order by member_id desc limit #{offset}, #{rowCount}

select member_id, member_identification, member_pw, member_name, member_email, member_phone_number, member_gender, member_birthday, member_grade, member_joined_date, member_status from tbl_member where member_id = #{memberId}
